        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has consistently exceeded client expectations, showcasing exceptional project management and technical execution. Clients praised their responsiveness and thoroughness, noting significant improvements in user experience and system performance. For instance, one client highlighted the reduction of page load times from 20 seconds to under 2 seconds and a 300% increase in sales after Designli&#39;s intervention. Their commitment to understanding client needs and delivering high-quality solutions has been a recurring theme in positive feedback.
      </p>

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations

The client&#39;s appreciation for the team&#39;s excellent communication and understanding of specific needs further underscores their satisfaction, indicating a strong alignment with project goals and a commitment to high-quality outcomes.
      </p>

Their proactive nature was particularly evident in their responsiveness to client needs and their expertise in mobile app development, which contributed to the project&#39;s success and client satisfaction.

                    title="Read Full Review on Wve Labs"

The overall feedback from clients is overwhelmingly positive, with 100% of reviewers praising the company's project management, communication, and ability to meet timelines. Clients value their competitive pricing and impressive design standards, often highlighting the professionalism and dedication of Wve Labs' team.

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

One client highlighted their exceptional design quality and responsiveness, stating, &#34;The app&#39;s quality and the vendor&#39;s delivery speed exceeded my expectations.&#34; Another client praised their project management, noting, &#34;They’ve met every milestone on time, if not early.&#34; Overall, clients commend Wve Labs for their professionalism, transparency, and ability to deliver outstanding products, making them a commendable choice for future projects.

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their excellent project management, timely delivery, and high-quality outcomes. One client noted, &#39;The end quality exceeded my expectations,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;MindSea went above and beyond.&#39; Their thorough processes and ability to adapt to client needs were also commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;They exceeded our expectations again.&#39; Overall, clients express strong satisfaction and a willingness to recommend MindSea for future projects.
      </p>

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Jafton consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews praising their exceptional project management and ability to seamlessly integrate with client teams. Clients highlighted Jafton&#39;s quick understanding of their visions and proactive problem-solving. One CEO noted, &#34;Jafton exceeded our expectations in every way,&#34; while another stated, &#34;Their dedication and technical skills made the development process easy and efficient.&#34; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Jafton&#39;s performance and outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>

        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

One client noted the project manager was &#39;easy to communicate with&#39; and provided &#39;frequent updates&#39; through various channels such as Zoom and Slack. This level of accessibility and transparency helped manage expectations effectively, with clients appreciating timely notifications about any issues. Overall, the sentiment surrounding Softclaire&#39;s communication is overwhelmingly positive, contributing significantly to their project success.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1152827"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The sentiment regarding Memory Squared&#39;s proactivity is overwhelmingly positive. Clients have praised the team&#39;s ability to anticipate challenges and provide solutions before issues arise. For instance, one client highlighted Mateusz&#39;s proactive approach in guiding project definitions and addressing potential roadblocks. Another client noted Memory Squared&#39;s exceptional responsiveness and adaptability, ensuring that project adjustments were made dynamically based on ongoing feedback. Overall, clients feel that Memory Squared&#39;s proactive communication and engagement significantly enhance project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li

        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
              data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="247469"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile App Design & Development for Nonprofit Org</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 6, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Appinventiv has over-delivered from day one, and we have exceeded all our goals in very difficult circumstances, engaging users in remote and conflict affected parts of East Africa. Firstly, <b>Appinventiv were able to build advanced features into our minimum value project, well beyond anything that could have been reasonably expected</b>. Second, we were able to achieve the very difficult task of rolling out a trial in remote parts of South Sudan and Sudan, testing and enhancing as we went along.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/appinventiv/247469"
            title="View Appinventiv Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="247469"
            data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"

Notably, one CEO highlighted their ability to enhance user engagement significantly and deliver results that improved internal processes by 40%. Another client emphasized their competitive, comprehensive solutions and effective budget management, noting that Synodus consistently delivered more than anticipated. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction and appreciation for Synodus&#39;s dedication to client success.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Digital Banking Platform Development for FinTech Firm
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Synodus built a digital banking platform for a fintech firm. The platform featured a current and savings account, a lending and borrowing system, and a payment system. They used APIs and cloud
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/synodus/350428"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Techne consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by a founder who noted that the final app not only matched but surpassed the initial design and brief. Another client praised the team&#39;s ability to elevate a simple idea into a polished app, stating they received far beyond what was anticipated. Overall, clients commend the exceptional communication, professionalism, and responsiveness throughout the project, leading to a sentiment of high satisfaction and strong recommendations.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1897305"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1106502"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express that Canadian Software Agency Inc exceeds expectations through their meticulous attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality solutions. One client highlighted their impressive ability to understand unique business requirements, resulting in a tailored mobile app that enhanced brand image and customer loyalty. Another noted their proactive project management, timely delivery, and effective communication, which fostered a positive working relationship. Overall, feedback indicates a strong alignment with client goals and exceptional service delivery.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1897305"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="212830"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1106502"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Custom Clothing Manufacturer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 1, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What impressed me most about this company was their attention to detail and their ability to understand our unique requirements. They took the time to thoroughly comprehend our brand identity, target audience, and business goals, which resulted in a tailored solution that perfectly aligned with our vision. Their technical expertise and innovative approach brought added value to the project, <b>exceeding our expectations</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/canadian-software-agency/212830"
            title="View Canadian Software Agency Inc Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1897305"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="212830"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1106502"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1897305"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="210912"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1106502"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev for Healthcare Real Estate Capital Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 22, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What impressed us most about Canadian Software Agency was their attention to detail and commitment to delivering a high-quality product. They took the time to understand our industry and tailored the website to meet our specific needs. Their creative design solutions and technical expertise <b>surpassed our expectations</b>. Additionally, their professionalism and strong work ethic created a positive working relationship throughout the project.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Five Pack Creative&#39;s proactive approach throughout their projects. One client noted the team&#39;s responsiveness and ability to guide decisions, stating it felt like a partnership rather than a traditional vendor relationship. They appreciated how the project manager quickly coordinated with the team, ensuring efficient communication. However, a client mentioned that a tighter timeline limited their ability to address certain features proactively, although they acknowledged this was not a fault of Five Pack Creative.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Well-organized projects
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed positive sentiments regarding the organization of projects undertaken by iTomych Studios. One client highlighted the effective communication and timely delivery of deliverables, noting that the collaboration was seamless despite the project&#39;s small scale. Additionally, the client praised the studio&#39;s maturity and flexibility, likening their operational culture to that of Silicon Valley firms. Overall, feedback indicates that iTomych Studios effectively manages projects, ensuring quality outcomes and client satisfaction.
      </p>

            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with Todor3D&#39;s accommodating nature, highlighting their adaptability and responsiveness. One client noted Maxim&#39;s ability to take feedback constructively and provide viable solutions to challenges. The communication style was described as excellent and very responsive, further underscoring the team&#39;s commitment to delivering quality service. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the company&#39;s flexibility and willingness to meet client needs.
      </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Smart Mobile House for their proactive approach throughout the project lifecycle. One client highlighted their ability to present alternative solutions when issues arose, showcasing their commitment to problem-solving. Another noted that the team not only met their requirements but also identified additional functionalities that enhanced the app&#39;s usability. Overall, the sentiment reflects high satisfaction with Smart Mobile House&#39;s engagement and initiative, indicating a strong fit for future projects.
      </p>
    </div>

The cooperation was very well streamlined and smooth.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Memcrab is recognized for its knowledgeable team, demonstrating expertise in programming and design, particularly in using React. Clients appreciate their proactive approach, suggesting improvements and maintaining focus on both short- and long-term goals. One client noted that Memcrab&#39;s understanding of their business and project management practices significantly contributed to a 100% annual growth in customer base. However, a suggestion for improvement was made regarding their SEO knowledge, indicating room for further expertise.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 18, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Their team introduced us to different project management concepts. <b>We started using Jira, which improved our visibility of deliverables and milestones</b>. We can keep track of any bugs and issues with the existing code. Memcrab is professional and responsive. Their team is attentive to details and in understanding our business. <b>Memcrab is always ahead of the game</b>. They suggest improvements to our site through different technologies.
            </p>

        Reviews mention Exceptional performance
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Flat Rock Technology consistently exceeds client expectations through high-quality deliverables and effective project management. A client from Brompton Bicycle noted their impressive ability to meet timelines and deliver exceptional code, highlighting their professionalism and commitment to going the extra mile. Despite minor communication challenges, the project manager successfully bridged gaps, ensuring clarity in goals. Overall, clients express high satisfaction with their engagement, emphasizing the value of detailed initial expectations to maximize project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="115963"
          data-gtm_insight_id="884137"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">E-commerce Dev for Travel Bicycle Retailer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 29, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              There are several things that impress me about them. On the management side, they are good at setting expectations—specifically when it comes to timelines—and <b>either meeting or exceeding them</b>. Additionally, they consistently deliver high-quality code. I think that is what separates them from their competition. There is a high degree of professionalism in the team, and they always <b>go the extra mile to complete a task</b>.
            </p>

          data-gtm_insight_id="1111040"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Design & Dev for Toy Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>

            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Their manager always collects all information before the start of work, including deep consideration of our business processes. Then we receive a detailed estimation of the cost of each stage or task, and terms of implementation - so we can plan our expenses. <b>We have direct communication with the development team and developers can ask about all unclear issues or warn about unexpected issues</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="2053541"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1153493"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised ALMAX Design and Development Agency for exceeding expectations in delivering high-quality, innovative designs tailored to user needs. One client highlighted their remarkable efficiency and responsiveness, noting that even with frequent task changes, ALMAX maintained effective communication and met all project deadlines. The agency&#39;s ability to enhance user experience and interface design was specifically commended, leading to improved user engagement metrics and overall satisfaction with the results.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2053541"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="277986"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1153493"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Branding & UX/UI Design for IT Services Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 26, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The most impressive aspect of ALMAX Design Agency was their ability to consistently deliver high-quality work while maintaining flexibility and responsiveness to our needs. Despite working with sparse briefs and frequently switching tasks, they consistently generated <b>innovative ideas and creative designs that exceeded expectations</b>. Their commitment to enhancing UX and optimizing UI designs for web apps stands out as unique, demonstrating a deep understanding of the project's objectives and target audience.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/almax-design-development-agency/277986"
            title="View ALMAX Design and Development Agency Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="2053541"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="277986"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Danubius IT Solutions has received positive feedback regarding their proactive approach. Clients noted their ability to adapt quickly to changing requirements and their initiative in suggesting solutions. One client highlighted their &#39;great alignment to business priorities&#39; and noted that deliverables were generated proactively. Another emphasized their &#39;proactivity and flexibility&#39; throughout the project, stating they consistently proposed ideas to address challenges. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Danubius&#39;s proactive project management.
      </p>
    </div>

              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 14, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">

I would also highlight how flexible Danubius remained through the project, quickly adapting to our current development needs, providing a Devops, tester, scalability tester, among other resources when needed.

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
    <div id="lm-providers__section" class="lm-only-related-block lm-providers sg-container">
    <h2 class="providers__list-title">List of the Top 15 Europe Mobile App Development Companies</h2>
